Cloudera | Senior Software Engineer, Sentry | Austin, Texas | Full-time | Onsite

Are you ready for a REAL challenge? Join the team at Cloudera and help answer the world's biggest questions.

Cloudera is looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer with distributed computing experience to help bring Apache Sentry to the level of functionality, security, performance, and robustness required to support high-demand workloads around the world.

This is a fantastic opportunity to join Cloudera's engineering efforts for Sentry. Sentry is one of the top revenue drivers at Cloudera and is used to grant role based authorization to data for many of our Fortune 500 customers.

More info and apply here: http://app.jobvite.com/m?3Q1ZliwY
